      Methods in uk.ac.reading.xj008217 that return Tile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tile World.getGridPosition(int x, int y)
      Returns the tile at a particular grid position
      Tile World.getTileAtScreenPosition(int x, int y)
      translates an x/y screen coordinate pair into a tile from the world grid
      Tile World.getTileAtWorldPosition(double x, double y)
      translates an x/y world coordinate pair (stored as doubles) into a tile from the world grid
      Tile World.getTileAtWorldPosition(int x, int y)
      translates an x/y world coordinate pair (stored as integers) into a tile from the world grid

    • Uses of Tile in uk.ac.reading.xj008217.entities

      Subclasses of Tile in uk.ac.reading.xj008217.entities 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Tile_Border
      A tile that is designed to give the world a boundary, both aesthetically and physically to stop LifeForms escaping.
      class  Tile_Forest
      A forest tile - acts as a barrier that is generated in natural forest patters, that feather out towards the edges.
      class  Tile_Grass
      A grass tile is the basic and most abundant tile in the simulation, herbivores eat the grass.
      class  Tile_River
      The river tile creates impassable barriers between sections of the simulation, and is generated in a way that looks and acts like a real river.
